text: Can you help me modify a meeting reservation?
Sure, I can help you with that. What changes do you want to make to your reservation?
I need to change the start time, location, and attendee list.
Alright, I can assist you with that. Before we proceed, could you please provide me your user credentials?
Sure, my username is newuser, and my password is newpass.
Ok, we have received your token. Now please tell me what you want to change.

I want to change the meeting topic to New Employee Orientation, start time to 2023-03-27 09:00:00, end time to 2023-03-27 11:00:00, location to Training Room, and attendees to David Wang, Amy Chen, and Erica Liu.
The meeting has been modified successfully.
